reviewText:
As a big fan of Latin American and Spanish cinema I will definitely put this at the top of my wish list!

Among the three, I've seen Viva Cuba - a witty, heart-warming story two kids and their journey across Cuba in pursue of a girl's father, their joint struggle against the decisions of the grown-ups and the test their friendship stands up to.

I came across some raving reviews of two other films and would really love to have this set.
